entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, introduced as 'he' in the text. The text states that Harry's insides went cold when he saw the dementors.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Tall, hooded creatures whose faces are concealed and have dead and rotten-looking hands. They are described as gliding slowly towards the chair in the center of the room.

entities.name: chair
entities.description: A chair with chains on its arms, located in the center of the room. The dementors are moving towards this chair.

relationships.description: Harry feels fear when he sees the dementors, as his insides go cold. The text states that Harry couldn't help but feel a sense of dread.
Harry is observing the chair with chains on its arms, which is located in the center of the room.
The dementors are grasping the man's arms with their dead and rotten-looking hands.
The dementors are gliding slowly towards the chair in the center of the room.
